title: aamir khan:Aamir Khan Makes A Valid Point On Mental Health, Says Emotional Hygiene Is As Important As Physical
text:
Bollywood actor Aamir Khan has always gone a step ahead and worked towards the social cause. He's not just an actor but a complete package as far as utilising his popularity is concerned.

Twitter

Whether it was Satyamev Jayate or talking about world issues on political affairs or trending topics, the actor always has a sound input to give to his friends and family.

Instagram/Aamir Khan

And now on the occasion of Mental Health week, Aamir took to Instagram to speak about emotional hygienic. He took to Instagram to share a meaningful message for all his fans. He wrote, "Emotional hygiene is as important as Physical hygiene. Being aware and sharing difficult emotions relieves stress. Physical exercise also can beat stress. Tackling it early prevents Depression. Anyone can suffer from Depression. Timely help works."

Don't Miss

Throwing light on mental-social health, Aamir Khan enlightened his fans on the importance of mental health. On the work front, the Bollywood actor will next be seen in Laal Singh Chadha.
